title: Uli Jon Roth: Legends of Rock - Live At Castle Donington [DVD]
description: A two CD and DVD live performance set by Uli Jon Roth at Castle Donington UK with special appearances from his dear friends. Featuring Jack Bruce on bass and vocals Michael Schenker and Phil Mogg & Pete Way of UFO.The highlights of this first 'Legends of Rock' performance are many as this DVD is testimony to; stunning performances of Uli's own material and renditions of classics compliment the amazing performances with the guest artists. Witness the inspired twin-lead guitar interplay between two of the greatest living guitarists Michael Schenker and Uli Jon Roth during some electrifying renditions of several UFO classics together with Phil Mogg and Pete Way. A historic moment was captured when Jack Bruce joined Uli and Clive Bunker on the stage without any prior rehearsal whatsoever to invoke the spirit of one of rock s most legendary supergroups the Cream. Although Uli and Jack had never before performed any of these songs together it was evident from the first few notes onwards that the unique chemistry between these two giants of rock resulted in an authentic and moving interpretation of the spirit of Cream.Format: DVD AUDIO Genre: MUSIC DVD/CONCERTS Rating: NR UPC: 693723020020 Manufacturer No: STH7464
